alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 10:03PM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected along I-80 in east of Grantsville to west of the Salt Lake City Airport and all local routes in the Tooele Valley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A lake band will continue to bring period of snow into the Tooele Valley, gradually diminishing overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
